page.description: If checked "Two value" property specifies two values, a start and an end value. If unchecked the slider will have one value.

section.description: The result of having two values looks something like this.

In order to actually see the values displayed it is necessary to first check the "Show slider message" property. After doing this click the [...] button next to the "Slider message property" and add the {valuestart} and {valueend} placeholders to the HTML work area. The result should look something like this
